text: 2|240|Uṅkaḷil maṉaivikaḷai viṭṭuviṭṭu iṟappavarkaḷ ‘taṅkaḷ maṉaivikaḷai (vīṭṭaiviṭṭu) appuṟappaṭutti viṭātu, ōr āṇṭuvarai uṇavu uṭai pōṉṟa celavukaḷai vaḻaṅkumāṟu' (vāricukaḷukku) maraṇa cācaṉam kūṟavum. Āṉāl, avarkaḷ (tāmākavē) veḷiyil ceṉṟu taṅkaḷukku muṟaippaṭi (tirumaṇam) ētum ceytu koṇṭā(l, a)taṉāl uṅkaḷ mītu kuṟṟamillai. Allāh mikaittavaṉ, nuṇṇaṟivuṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
